claim_text: “Tens of thousands” of vaccinations are being administered in Bolton “every single day”.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is wrong. Official figures show that the highest number of people vaccinated in Bolton in a single day is 5,465.

review_rating.alternateName: This is wrong. Official figures show that the highest number of people vaccinated in Bolton in a single day is 5,465.

claim_text: Most of the world trades with the EU on WTO terms.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Of 135 non-EU full members of the World Trade Organisation, 58 currently trade with the EU under negotiated trade terms, and another 47 have preferential access to EU markets.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Of 135 non-EU full members of the World Trade Organisation, 58 currently trade with the EU under negotiated trade terms, and another 47 have preferential access to EU markets.

claim_text: Israel, Singapore, India, Hong Kong and the U.S. trade with the EU under WTO terms.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Israel has a trade agreement with the EU. Also, while Singapore currently trades with the EU under WTO terms, it has reached a trade agreement with the EU that now needs approval by the European Parliament and Council.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Israel has a trade agreement with the EU. Also, while Singapore currently trades with the EU under WTO terms, it has reached a trade agreement with the EU that now needs approval by the European Parliament and Council.

claim_text: An Instagram post shows a mine worker with 0% body fat.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The man pictured is a fitness model, not a mine worker, who does not claim to have 0% body fat.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The man pictured is a fitness model, not a mine worker, who does not claim to have 0% body fat.

claim_text: Employees pay 12% of anything over £9,500 a year in National Insurance.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Employees start paying National Insurance on earnings above £12,576 a year. This is currently 10% on earnings up to £50,268 a year. Anyone earning more than this pays 2% on earnings above this threshold.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Employees start paying National Insurance on earnings above £12,576 a year. This is currently 10% on earnings up to £50,268 a year. Anyone earning more than this pays 2% on earnings above this threshold.

claim_text: A video shows actors pretending to be victims of the Russian invasion of Ukraine in 2022.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The video shows actors making a Ukrainian TV series in 2020.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The video shows actors making a Ukrainian TV series in 2020.

claim_text: Government debt has doubled under the Conservatives.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Not correct. Public sector net debt, adjusted for inflation, rose by 53% between 2009/10 and 2016/17.

review_rating.alternateName: Not correct. Public sector net debt, adjusted for inflation, rose by 53% between 2009/10 and 2016/17.

claim_text: Tommy Robinson was prosecuted for causing distress to defendants in a grooming trial.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Mr Robinson was prosecuted and found guilty of contempt of court for breaking a reporting ban.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Mr Robinson was prosecuted and found guilty of contempt of court for breaking a reporting ban.

claim_text: There is pork in Covid-19 vaccines.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Neither the Pfizer, AstraZeneca, nor the Moderna vaccines contain any animal products.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Neither the Pfizer, AstraZeneca, nor the Moderna vaccines contain any animal products.

claim_text: Keir Starmer wrote an article titled “Eddie Izzard is a true working class woman who represents the real values of the Labour Party”, apparently for the Guardian.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. A spokesperson confirmed that the headline or article has not been published by the Guardian, and there are discrepancies between the actual Guardian’s site and the image posted.

review_rating.alternateName: False. A spokesperson confirmed that the headline or article has not been published by the Guardian, and there are discrepancies between the actual Guardian’s site and the image posted.

claim_text: The Covid-19 virus is not spread asymptomatically. Only sick people give it to other people.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The virus can be spread by asymptomatic and presymptomatic people.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The virus can be spread by asymptomatic and presymptomatic people.

claim_text: We should never do any testing of asymptomatic people. All we’re doing is generating false positives.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Testing people who don’t have symptoms uncovers many people who have asymptomatic and presymptomatic Covid-19. The false positive rate of Covid-19 tests is very low.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Testing people who don’t have symptoms uncovers many people who have asymptomatic and presymptomatic Covid-19. The false positive rate of Covid-19 tests is very low.

claim_text: The World Health Organisation as of June 25th has said no asymptomatic testing.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The WHO said it only recommended asymptomatic testing for at-risk groups.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The WHO said it only recommended asymptomatic testing for at-risk groups.

claim_text: Natural immunity is robust, complete, and durable. It cannot be improved upon by vaccination, or any other method.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Studies have shown natural immunity to Covid-19 can wane, and that, among people who have been infected, those who have been vaccinated are less likely to be reinfected.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Studies have shown natural immunity to Covid-19 can wane, and that, among people who have been infected, those who have been vaccinated are less likely to be reinfected.

claim_text: The current Covid vaccines are obsolete as they do not cover the new variants.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. All the vaccines mentioned have shown efficacy against the main Covid-19 variants, albeit to varying degrees.

review_rating.alternateName: False. All the vaccines mentioned have shown efficacy against the main Covid-19 variants, albeit to varying degrees.

claim_text: Government data shows 460 deaths and 243,612 injuries from Covid-19 vaccines in the UK.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is wrong. Deaths and other 'injuries' may occur after someone has had a vaccine, but this does not mean they were caused by the vaccine.

review_rating.alternateName: This is wrong. Deaths and other 'injuries' may occur after someone has had a vaccine, but this does not mean they were caused by the vaccine.

claim_text: HMRC employs 300 people to investigate tax fraud.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. In February 2018 HMRC employed around 26,000 people “tackling all forms of non-compliance in the tax system”.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. In February 2018 HMRC employed around 26,000 people “tackling all forms of non-compliance in the tax system”.

claim_text: Leaving the customs union and single market will cost every person in Scotland £1,600.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. This comes from a dated estimate of how much less Scottish GDP will grow by 2030 in such a scenario, compared to remaining in the EU. It doesn’t represent a cash loss, but is how much smaller Scottish GDP would be per person compared to remaining in the EU.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. This comes from a dated estimate of how much less Scottish GDP will grow by 2030 in such a scenario, compared to remaining in the EU. It doesn’t represent a cash loss, but is how much smaller Scottish GDP would be per person compared to remaining in the EU.

claim_text: There would have been fewer deaths without Covid-19 vaccines.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. There is clear evidence that the vaccines saved far more lives than they cost.

review_rating.alternateName: False. There is clear evidence that the vaccines saved far more lives than they cost.

claim_text: Lord Kerr, who sits on the UK Supreme Court, wrote Article 50 of the Treaty on European Union.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Wrong. There are two Lord Kerrs. John Kerr, who was one of the authors of Article 50, does not sit on the Supreme Court. That’s Brian Kerr.

review_rating.alternateName: Wrong. There are two Lord Kerrs. John Kerr, who was one of the authors of Article 50, does not sit on the Supreme Court. That’s Brian Kerr.

claim_text: A video shows the aftermath of two people being stabbed by Muslims during a protest in Stoke over the weekend of 3 August.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. Staffordshire Police say the video shows a man being treated for a head injury. The police said two men involved in the incident were hit with a blunt object that was thrown in the air and that no stabbings had been reported.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. Staffordshire Police say the video shows a man being treated for a head injury. The police said two men involved in the incident were hit with a blunt object that was thrown in the air and that no stabbings had been reported.

claim_text: Mobile phone networks are in breach of GDPR by providing your phone number to another agency to allow emergency alerts.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. When an alert is triggered, mobile phone masts broadcast it to every compatible phone and tablet within range. The government doesn’t use personal data, like your mobile phone number, to do this.

review_rating.alternateName: False. When an alert is triggered, mobile phone masts broadcast it to every compatible phone and tablet within range. The government doesn’t use personal data, like your mobile phone number, to do this.

claim_text: An image shows a young Palestinian girl who grew up to be a lecturer in Canada.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. The woman pictured is Iraqi, not Palestinian, and the ages of the girl and woman don’t match.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. The woman pictured is Iraqi, not Palestinian, and the ages of the girl and woman don’t match.

claim_text: The number of deaths so far this year in the UK (up to week 39) has been 454,000.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. This is the figure for England and Wales only. For the UK as a whole it is 513,987.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. This is the figure for England and Wales only. For the UK as a whole it is 513,987.

claim_text: We are on course to have a death toll this year in line with recent years.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Unless deaths decline sharply, the UK death toll is likely to be its highest in decades.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Unless deaths decline sharply, the UK death toll is likely to be its highest in decades.

claim_text: Asda’s self-service tills use facial recognition to collect customers’ data for targeted advertising.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. Asda has confirmed the machines do not store any visual data.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. Asda has confirmed the machines do not store any visual data.

claim_text: NHS England waiting lists started to fall in October 2023 when there was a period without industrial action.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. NHS England’s non-emergency waiting list did fall in October, but there were three strike days in October too.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. NHS England’s non-emergency waiting list did fall in October, but there were three strike days in October too.

claim_text: Magnets can stick to your arm after a Covid-19 jab because they contain a microchip or other metals.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. The vaccines do not contain a microchip and there is nothing in a vaccine that could cause a magnet to stick to your skin after getting it.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. The vaccines do not contain a microchip and there is nothing in a vaccine that could cause a magnet to stick to your skin after getting it.

claim_text: Jodie Foster said that attacking the rich was “self-defense”.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. There is no evidence that Ms Foster has ever said this.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. There is no evidence that Ms Foster has ever said this.

claim_text: A video shows a new ‘iron beam’ system in operation in Israel.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This footage is taken from a video game called Arma 3.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This footage is taken from a video game called Arma 3.

claim_text: All of the turbines at Whitelee Wind Farm were made in Indonesia.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. All of the turbines at Whitelee Wind Farm were manufactured in Europe.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. All of the turbines at Whitelee Wind Farm were manufactured in Europe.

claim_text: A picture shows an intact house surrounded by homes destroyed in the LA fires. The house was lived in by a Christian.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. The image has been modified with or created by a Google Artificial Intelligence (AI) program.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. The image has been modified with or created by a Google Artificial Intelligence (AI) program.

claim_text: The entire stadium watching an annual football game between US Army and Navy military colleges chanted the slogan “F*** Joe Biden”.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. Audio in the footage has been altered. The original video shows the crowd singing along to electronic dance music track ‘Tsunami’.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. Audio in the footage has been altered. The original video shows the crowd singing along to electronic dance music track ‘Tsunami’.

claim_text: 2016 saw the steepest fall in university applications for 30 years.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is wrong. In 2016 the number of applicants to UK universities fell slightly, but not by as much as they did in 2012, following the increase in tuition fees. The number of applications to UK universities (which doesn’t include applications made after the June application deadline) rose in 2016. The number of applicants for 2017 (reported after 15 January deadline) showed a fall of 5%. This is the second largest of three falls since 2002.

review_rating.alternateName: This is wrong. In 2016 the number of applicants to UK universities fell slightly, but not by as much as they did in 2012, following the increase in tuition fees. The number of applications to UK universities (which doesn’t include applications made after the June application deadline) rose in 2016. The number of applicants for 2017 (reported after 15 January deadline) showed a fall of 5%. This is the second largest of three falls since 2002.

claim_text: Money raised by Captain Tom Moore is only going to the NHS in England.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Money raised by Captain Tom is going towards the Covid-19 appeal run by NHS Charities Together, which distributes money to charities across all four UK nations.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Money raised by Captain Tom is going towards the Covid-19 appeal run by NHS Charities Together, which distributes money to charities across all four UK nations.

claim_text: The percentage of the UK population who have received a booster vaccine is double that of any other European country.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. As of 12-14 December, 35% of the UK population had received a booster, below Iceland (54%) and only just ahead of Austria and Hungary.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. As of 12-14 December, 35% of the UK population had received a booster, below Iceland (54%) and only just ahead of Austria and Hungary.

claim_text: People who share a Facebook post commenting “Love Cadbury” will receive a free chocolate hamper.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This post comes from a fake page, not from Cadbury itself.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This post comes from a fake page, not from Cadbury itself.

claim_text: A new trial drug being tested by Pfizer is actually ivermectin being rebranded.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. There may be similarities in how they work, but the two drugs are structurally very different.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. There may be similarities in how they work, but the two drugs are structurally very different.

claim_text: The video shows US military equipment left to the Taliban when it withdrew from Afghanistan.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The footage is actually of a US military depot in California.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The footage is actually of a US military depot in California.

claim_text: Pfizer’s CEO said a company goal was to reduce the number of people in the world by 50%.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Pfizer’s CEO did not say this. A video has been edited to make it sound like he did.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Pfizer’s CEO did not say this. A video has been edited to make it sound like he did.

claim_text: Widely-used images of a Ukrainian woman wounded following an airstrike near Kharkiv actually depict events from 2018.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false, the photographs are genuine and were taken at the outset of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false, the photographs are genuine and were taken at the outset of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

claim_text: An interactive NHS England report shows the number of patients waiting for treatment.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. It shows the number of cases where somebody is waiting. The numbers are different because some patients are waiting for more than one thing.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. It shows the number of cases where somebody is waiting. The numbers are different because some patients are waiting for more than one thing.

claim_text: The EU has stopped the UK from having free ports.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. Free ports exist within the EU. The UK had free ports until 2012. However, EU law means free ports exist in a more limited form than elsewhere in the world.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. Free ports exist within the EU. The UK had free ports until 2012. However, EU law means free ports exist in a more limited form than elsewhere in the world.

claim_text: The UK bought all the Midazolam France had.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. The Department of Health and Social Care has confirmed that all of the Midazolam stockpiled in the UK for the Covid-19 crisis was sourced within the UK and was produced for the UK market. It appears that this claim is based on reports of some French-label versions of the drug being stockpiled for use in the UK.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. The Department of Health and Social Care has confirmed that all of the Midazolam stockpiled in the UK for the Covid-19 crisis was sourced within the UK and was produced for the UK market. It appears that this claim is based on reports of some French-label versions of the drug being stockpiled for use in the UK.

claim_text: A lot of the vaccine ingredients haven’t been tested for their efficacy.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. Efficacy data has been published for all three Covid-19 vaccines approved for use in the UK.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. Efficacy data has been published for all three Covid-19 vaccines approved for use in the UK.

claim_text: A BBC News article reported that spike protein had been “found in dead babies”.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. The article reported that there had been two spikes in the rate of neonatal deaths.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. The article reported that there had been two spikes in the rate of neonatal deaths.

claim_text: A clip shows a Palestinian girl buried under rubble.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The video shows a child looking through a hole in a wall.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The video shows a child looking through a hole in a wall.

claim_text: A video shows farmers in Ukraine harvesting a field set on fire by Russian shelling.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This video was actually filmed in Michigan, USA.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This video was actually filmed in Michigan, USA.

claim_text: A Reform UK candidate who stood for election in Clapham and Brixton Hill may not be a real person.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The candidate in question, Mark Matlock, is a real person.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The candidate in question, Mark Matlock, is a real person.

claim_text: An image shows the union flag flying at half-mast over Buckingham Palace.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This image was taken on 8 September 2022, and shows the flag at half-mast over Buckingham Palace following the death of Queen Elizabeth II.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This image was taken on 8 September 2022, and shows the flag at half-mast over Buckingham Palace following the death of Queen Elizabeth II.
